Great for the DIY, household maintenance, and most general repairs, not for industrial work. A great tool addition to any tool box set.
☞Durability: Quality is a guarantee with this 3 piece sturdy and durable solid steel set designed to withstand torque compression under most standard use situations. The exterior anti-weathering coating provides extra protection from damage against elements and substances such as oil and fluids that may come in contact with the extension bars during use with repairs such as in the automotive field.

【Wide Application】Perfectly fit all types of vehicles. This ground strap is a good parner that connects an engine block to a framework. The rated current of this engine ground strap is 62 Amps.
【High-quality Copper Materials】 This ground strap is made of copper with a tin-plated surface to provide superior current delivery, resistance to oxidation and corrosion, as well as a long service life.

▲Package Included:
1 x (1/4 * 1/4 * 65mm length — 1/4 ” shank can be converted to 6.35mm square head)Socket Adapter
1 x (3/8 * 1/4 * 65mm length — 1/4 ” shank can be converted to 9mm square head)Socket Adapter
1 x (1/2 * 1/4 * 72mm length — 1/4 ” shank can be converted to 13mm square head)Socket Adapter
1 x 105 Degree Right Angle Drill
▲Key Features: 
1. Adapts sockets to power drills and drivers
2. Detent ball for secure socket retention so sockets snap on tightly and won’t slip off
3. 1/4-inch hex shank prevents stripping during high speed drill operation
4. Super strong heat-treated chrome vanadium steel for normal and impact use
5. Sandblasted finish
6. Converts all power drills into speedy socket drivers
7. Use with a hand screwdriver handle or battery/power tool
8. Color coded for easy recognition 
▲Specification:
● Material: stainless steel
● Color: silver(as pictures shown)
● Size: approx. 5.9 x 3cm
● Model: 1/4″ (6.35mm)
● Fits: 1/4″ 6.35mm hex drill bit screwdriver
Features:
● 105°designs for tight spaces, extends the power of a cordless screwdriver, max torque: 10n/m.
● 1/4 inch hex drive shaft is quick change compatible and fits most power drill and driver chucks.
● 105 Degree Right Angle Driver Drilling and Driving Power Screwdriver Drill Attachment with 1/4-inch Hex Quick Change Drive and Magnetic Bit Socket
● Easy & fast, connect to the standard hex screwdrier.
● Can be connected to drill, rechargeable drill or manual wrench.
● Easy, Lightweight, fast, connect to the standard hex screwdrier.
● The gears are mounted in a die cast with 3 durable ball bearings.
● Magnetic 1/4 inch hex socket accepts and holds standard drill and driver bits.
● Perfect handy tool for hard-to-reach areas.Connect hand drill and manual wrench.

CR-V and black phosphate finish. Forged with heat treated chrome vanadium steel for superior strength, each adapter with corrosion-resistant black phosphate finish for against rust and corrosion. Detent ball on adapters provides a secure fit into the socket,reduces wear and prevents rounding off at corners,ensuring does not wobble while working.

【Purpose-3Pcs】: This adapter set is designed to provide a securely locked in extension to your existing tool. Provides additional length to reach into a multitude of hard to reach spaces. The spring ball lock ensures a tight fit into the driver head to prevent slipping during use. Specifically machined to fit securely into a hand held driver, drill driver or impact wrench.

[MATERIAL] – Super soft and fuzzy fleece lined material, this pullover tops will definitely keep you warm all day. Zipper sweatshirts for women lightweight warmth, breathable, cozy.
[FEATURES] – Athletic workout hoodies,women pullover sweatshirt,long sleeve with thumbhole ,1/2 zip up collar, solid color,cropped length,stand collar,fleece lined,kangaroo pockets,relaxed fit,crop top,with thumbholes.
[DESIGN] – Thumb hole hoodies can keep the sleeves from shifting or flapping in the wind, help keep your sleeves in place and hands warm, add a little more coverage in cold weather.An exaggerated fit that feels extra roomy.Not too short, not too long, just right around the waistband.

[LASLULU SERVICE] – We listen to customer feedback and fine-tune every detail to ensure quality, fit, and comfort.Each of your orders is the greatest encouragement to our shop, We’re always working to create the best for our customers.

LASLULU Womens Long Sleeve Fleece Sherpa Lined Zip Up Hooded Outwear with Pocket

This Fleece Lined Sweatshirts is Made of High Quality & Skin Friendly Material, Definitely Comfortable & Warm. It’s suitable for Spring, Autumn and Winter.

The lightweight fuzzy fabric is cozy and textural.

Features:

  • Zipped turtleneck, cozy oversize fit
  • Pullover design with kangaroo pocket on the front
  • Ultra soft pile fleece keep you warm and fashionable
  • It is a must-have in your wardrobe, and also is a Perfect Gift For A Friends, Wife, Mother, Aunt, Grandmother, Girlfriend Or Family.

If you are taller I’d recommend sizing up.

Tip: Due to many customers’ feedback that the leather zipper interface is easy to break, we replaced the zipper puller with a stronger metal zipper puller. We hope this will reduce customers’ worries about zipper pullers.

The fleece hooded cardigan is great for daily casual, work office, fall, winter holidays, going out, school, gym,vacation, party,it can also be a sweet Christmas Gift,New Year, Valentine’s Day to your love, friends or yourself.

Thumb Hole Design

Thumb hole hoodies can keep the sleeves from shifting or flapping in the wind, help keep your sleeves in place and hands warm, add a little more coverage in cold weather.

  • Wash with like colours
  • Machine wash cold
  • Do not bleach
  • Tumble dry low
  • Do not iron
  • Do not dry clean

LASLULU Womens Pullover Fleece Hoodie

Designed for women’s sports wear in autumn and winter.

  • Pair them with jeans, athletic pants,joggers,wide-leg pants, and tights, or pair them with an overcoat, jacket, or leather coat for a casual sport look.
  • In daily exercise, it is very easy to catch a cold after exercise. Wearing it will give you warmth. Plus the unique design of the clothes makes you more attractive.
  • Style: Casual / Sports / Athletic
  • Size Type: Regular Size
  • Season: Autumn/Winter
  • Closure: 1/2 Zipper
  • Gender: Women

I love this hoodie! This was my second color to purchase. They are so comfortable and perfect for both athletic and casual wear.

Love the half so hoodie. So comfy and warm for my trips to the gym or out walking. All the pockets are also a big plus.
